CmdLine: buildDeps='curl ca-certificates build-essential zlib1g-dev python cmake';   set -ex;   apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends;   rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;     mkdir /usr/src/kafkacat;   curl -SLs "https://github.com/edenhill/kafkacat/archive/master.tar.gz" | tar -xzf - --strip-components=1 -C /usr/src/kafkacat;   cd /usr/src/kafkacat;   ./bootstrap.sh;   mv ./kafkacat /usr/local/bin/;     rm -rf /usr/src/kafkacat/tmp-bootstrap;   apt-get purge -y --auto-remove $buildDeps
Commands.Name: run
